headline.print_headline: Get Paid to Borrow Money (Risks and Limits Apply)
headline.main: Get Paid to Borrow Money (Risks and Limits Apply)

snippet: Making money by taking out a loan sounds tempting and is theoretically possible, but it’s probably best to stay out of the fray in Europe.
abstract: James B Stewart Common Sense column observes that theoretical opportunity to make money by borrowing has emerged in Europe, where benchmark for an array of loans has fallen below zero for first time; observes that tactic is probably inadvisable due to residency constraints, unforeseen costs and significant risk; examines trends that led to negative rates.
